dcterms:creator: J. Lorenzo-Trueba
J. Yamagishi
T. Toda
D. Saito
F. Villavicencio
T. Kinnunen
Z. Ling
dcterms:description: The VCC 2018 dataset is based on the device and production speech (DAPS) dataset, which includes recordings of professional US English speakers. It comprises two tasks: Hub task (parallel VC) and Spoke Task (non-parallel VC), with a total of 20,580 submitted utterances rated by 267 people for naturalness.
dcterms:title: Voice Conversion Challenge 2018

dcterms:creator: G. J. Mysore
dcterms:description: The DAPS dataset includes recordings of professional US English speakers and aims to transform speech recorded on common consumer devices into professional production quality speech.
dcterms:title: device and production speech (DAPS) dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Toda
L. Chen
D. Saito
F. Villavicencio
M. Wester
Z. Wu
J. Yamagishi
dcterms:description: The VCC 2016 dataset comprised only a parallel voice conversion task, with a total of 26,028 utterances from 20 systems, used to test the generalization ability of models trained on the VCC 2018 training set.
dcterms:title: Voice Conversion Challenge 2016
